amendment.description: Amendment to require an assessment of the effects that a proposed or final rule are expected to have on private property owners, including the use and value of affected property.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reed amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Reed amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Reed.
